duties_responsibilities.duty: Development and execution of major process development work, qualification of manufacturing workflows and campaigns for manufacturing of GMP cell products for clinical trials.
Planning and directing the work of research associates, laboratory assistants, technicians, and aides.
Training laboratory staff in specialized procedures, methodologies, and equipment use and maintenance.
Contribution of original ideas of methodological significance to the group.
Performing specialized procedures and preparing written reports of laboratory methods, and associated SOPs.
Ensuring that all laboratory activities are carried out in compliance with safety procedures and guidelines in handling, storage, and disposal of bio-hazardous, infectious, and toxic material.

education_certification.credential: Ph.D. in Immunology, Biomedical Sciences, or related field (Master's preferred)
